fcb_fab_flexible_title: PCB Assembly Later Stage: PCBA Testing and Shell Assembly
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_title: Overview of PCBA Testing and Shell Assembly
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_zero: Unlike some PCB assemblers, PCBONLINE tests the functionality before delivering the PCBA to clients and can assemble the shell of products.
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_one: During the complicated PCBA process, various problems may occur due to improper equipment or operation, and without testing, there is no guarantee that the products are qualified. Therefore, PCB testing is required to ensure that each product does not have quality problems.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_title: Why Buy PCB Assembly from PCBONLINE
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_one: • We test functionality (FCT) of PCBA to ensure product quality.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_two: • Our assembly quality is also ensured by first article inspection and 3D-scanning AOI.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_three: • Our reflow soldering ovens can process both lead-free and lead-containing soldering.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_four: • We can mount electronic components on a single side and double sides of advanced circuit boards.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_five: • We check your BOM carefully before assembly and offer free DFM/DFX.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_six: • We manufacture and assemble PCBs from prototypes to mass production.

fcb_fab_flexible_related_title: Other Users Are Also Getting a Quote to Related Assembly Solutions
fcb_fab_flexible_related_rigid_word: If you order turnkey PCB assembly from PCBONLINE, you will get perfect EMS service and ready-to-use electronic products. All you need to provide is only your requirements, and we will make the best products as you wish.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_tick_word: High volume PCB assembly refers to a large quantity of printed circuit board assemblies of 10,000 pieces or more, including DFM checking and DFT checking.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_multilayer_word: PCBONLINE have strict management over the component sourcing. All the components we provide to you are of excellent quality and compliant with the RoHS standard and you can get any parts as you want.
